All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AppController
The AppController class manages the entire application's execution flow
DataController
The DataController class contains the app's logic for loading the user database and saving user data to it
LoginController
LoginController handles user interactions during the login process
LoginMenuMessages
The LoginMenuMessages class contains the dynamic messages displayed in the login menu
PongApp
The PongApp class launches the application
PongGameController
The PongController class contains the main logic for controlling the pong gameplay
PongGameMessages
The PongGameMessages class contains the dynamic messages displayed during game execution
PongMenuController
The PongMenuController class contains the logic for handling the non-gameplay-related elements of the pong game, including the forfeit button, back to menu button, and play again button
PongMenuMessages
The PongMenuMessages class contains the dynamic messages displayed in the pre-game menu
PreGameController
The PreGameController class contains the logic for pre-game screen operations
RegisterController
LoginController handles user interactions during the account creation process
RegisterMenuMessages
The RegisterMenuMessages class contains the dynamic messages displayed in the register menu
StartScreenController
The StartScreenController class contains the logic for navigating the start screen of the application
User
User represents a user account, including username, password, and pong win count
